# Retro Web Portfolio - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A retro-styled web portfolio featuring projects and contacts sections, built with React + Tailwind CSS frontend and PHP backend.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: PHP
- **Colors**: White (primary), Black (secondary)
- **Style**: Retro aesthetic

## Project Structure
```
portfolio-backend/
├── frontend/          # React + Tailwind CSS application
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── components/
│   │   ├── pages/
│   │   └── App.jsx
│   └── package.json
├── backend/           # PHP API
│   ├── api/
│   └── config/
└── README.md
```

## Development Guidelines
- Use white (#FFFFFF) and black (#000000) as primary colors
- Apply retro design elements (pixel fonts, borders, shadows)
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use RESTful API patterns for PHP backend
